summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 62nd Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast, by widening existing roadway, grading and graveling, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7128, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
